DOC.brief_title: The Effect Macronutrients Diet Digestive Cardiovascular Health
DOC.detailed_description: High-fat ( HF ) diet little three day show accelerate GI transit . This study aim assess 5-day HF supplement diet vary fatty acid composition sufficient accelerate GI transit , appetite response substrate utilisation whether 5-day deadaptation period HF diet would reverse response induced adaptation HFD . The study conduct randomize , single-blinded manner 24 healthy subject . Three 5-day intervention follow test trial . In first intervention period ( CON ) , normal diet supplement low-fat ( LF ) milkshake ( 272 kcal , 6 g fat ) . The second third intervention involve repeat previous diet along HF ( 1082 kcal , 96 g fat ) LF milkshakes respectively . The three high-fat supplement group subject randomized follow : ( 1 ) olive oil ( 90 g oil ) , ( 2 ) olive oil + n-3 EPA/DHA fish powder blend ( 3 ) olive oil + macadamia oil blend . The effect 5-day HF diet ( daily milkshake supplement : 1082 kcal , 96 g fat ) gastric empty mouth caecum transit time high-fat test measure use 13C octanoic acid breath test H2 inulin breath test respectively six hour postprandially . During time course , measurement subjective appetite sensation visual analogue scale substrate utilization indirect calorimetry also collect . Subsequently , food intake measure use ad libitum buffet meal .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult age 1835 year History gastrointestinalrelated condition gastrointestinal disturbance within 3 month study entry diabetes mellitus cardiovascular disease Allergies food study Pregnancy
